body.name: Hockmez 5-Tier Small Shoe Rack,Stackable Shoe Shelf Storage Organizer for Entryway Hallway Closet Bathroom Living Room(Black-5Tier)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 57 mins
features: 【Upgrade with handrails】This narrow shoe racks meet diverse needs. You can remove this layer to accommodate boots, heels, or larger accessories. The special expandable design allows you to buy 2 sets and stack vertically to create a larger shoe rack. You can also disassemble and combine various layers that suit you, such as 3+7 or 4+6 layers, etc.

【Multifunctional】 This stackable shoe rack is not only for shoes, It could be a display stand for your toys, books, plants and more.It also works great for kitchen food containers storage and garden supplies storage. This storage rack is a perfect choice for renters.

【Space Saving Shoe Storage】The small shoe rack for entryway with standard size of 17.5" W x 11.4" D x35.4" H, A good solution to keep your entryway, closet, dormitory, patio, mudroom and garage away from messes. It’ll safely accommodate your ever-expanding shoe collection while saving your valuable floor space.

【Material & Structure】Made from durable waterproof non-woven fabric tiers , Strengthened plastic connectors and thickened alloy steel.Thickened alloy steel pipes are hard to bend even put larger & heavy objects, that makes this rack shelf sturdier, stabler and longer lifetime.The fabric is also easy to clean with a dry or wet cloth.

【Easy And Quick Assembly】The simple structure and light weight make the rack very convenient for you to assemble and disassemble. Installation requires only a few easy steps and no special tools are needed. Simply attach the shelf tubes to the side frame, then place the nonwoven fabric on tubes for each tier and snap tightly. Easy to reposition and transport.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a shoe rack.
reviews.reviewText: Not the sturdiest shoe rack, but it comes together fairly easy and holds a decent amount of shoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for entryway
reviews.reviewText: I haven't figured out how to put the top finishing rack together, but its compact and perfect for a few pairs of shoes by the door. A little on the flimsy side, but not horrible and the price was right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works but poorly made. Does the job for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Works once it’s put together. Assembly is difficult due to the fact that over half of the metal rods don’t fit into the holes in the plastic end pieces. I had to hammer the ends of the metal rods in to fit into the holes on at least half of them. The actual shelf piece is a felt piece covered in a plastic material. It seems sturdy enough but might rip over time with a sharp heel. I have some heavier boots that just barely fit in the shelf and if the shelf isn’t supported, pulling the boot out pulls the shelf over. It is a pretty light shelf. I do imagine with too much weight on the shelf it will eventually break the plastic end pieces, but at the end of the day, it’s not that expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It falls apart of you look at it the wrong way
reviews.reviewText: My son ordered this for his shoes in his room since I was tired of them being all over the floor. It looks and works great as long as you don't touch it, bump into it or look at it the wrong way. I solved this by super gluing all of the connection points together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: This little shoe rack comfortably fits 8 pairs of my son’s size 10 shoes. It’s super lightweight, but seems sturdy. It was easy to assemble, and is a great solution for tight spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a solution to many shoes in a very, very tight space, and this was the (almost) perfect answer! Very inexpensive, you can buy different versions of this (the various levels of tiers) and they all fit together, and very easy to assemble (I HATE assembly). Sturdy after a week and I have no reason to think it will change, although I'm not sure about much heavier shoes, like my husband's Timberland's-they may eventually make it start to bow in over time, maybe. My only real problem is I can't fit my husband's shoes (10.5W) and my shoes (7.5M) on the same level, it's not wide enough. I can work with it though between our shoes and our son's shoes. I bought 2 4-tier racks but used one as a 3 tier and the other as a 5 tier. Space saver and looks nice, too, very happy with the purchase overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars U get what u pay for
reviews.reviewText: Very cheap and flimsy . Pictures and description very misleading put anything over a pound on the fabric shelf it sags down . Wouldn't recommend if u actually want something sturdy like a book shelf

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit small but worth the money
reviews.reviewText: It's not quite as wide as the photo makes it seem - two pairs of crocs (W8) next to each other is a squeeze. However, it is perfect for campers, small closets, etc and super easy to put together.
Easy to assemble, simple design and fits two pairs of size 12 shoes neatly side by side. Bought two sets and stacked it up.
